## Load Packages
```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

## Code


```{r}
airports2 <- airports %>% 
  select(faa, name)%>%
  rename(dest = faa)

flights2 <- flights %>%
  select(dest,origin, distance)

flights2 %>% 
  left_join(airports2, by= "dest") %>%
  filter(distance==4983) %>% slice(1)
```
